QuestData.Title: Audience with the Stonemother
QuestData.Description: Stay where you are, champion. I have not yet decided what to do with you or your Earthen Ring.
QuestData.LogDescription: Attend the Audience with the Stonemother.
QuestData.RewardText: Ya've done well, $Gbrotha:sista;. Da Stonemother be listenin' and da World Pillar is not far from our reach.
